page.title: 13SCHOOLS IN BURY AREA
page.content: There are two schools in our area, these are the AILWYN COMMUNITY SCHOOL and BURY CHURCH OF ENGLAND PRIMARY SCHOOL. The Ailwyn has around 900 pupils starting from 11 years to 14 years old.There are 47 members of staff.The headmaster is MR T.Turner but soon he will be leaving and that will make 3 heads in 4 years. Bury Primary school is a very small Church of England school in the middle of Bury.There headmaster is MR.Rogers and he lives in Bury.The school has around 125 pupils and 5 members of staff.Bury is one of 8 feeder schools to the Ailwyn. These schools are: :Somersham,Ramsey,Upwood,Bury, Bluntisham,Warboys,Earith and Ramsey St.Mary's.
